Wakusei no Samidare

  • 4.96 (25 Votes)
  • Bookmark Comments Subscribe Upload Add
  • Alternative Name:惑星のさみだれ; Lucifer and the Biscuit Hammer; Hoshi no Samidare
  • Demographic:Seinen
  • Genre(s):Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Romance, Supernatural
  • Author(s):Mizukami Satoshi
  • Artist(s):Mizukami Satoshi
  • Status(s):Completed
  • Rank:4702th
  • Type:manga
  • Summary:
    The world is in mortal peril. Sir Noi Crezant, the Lizard Knight, has been sent to gain the aid of the great warrior Amamiya Yuuhi in hopes of finding the Princess Samidare and protecting the planet from the incredible 'Biscuit Hammer' poised to crack the Earth in two. Unfortunat... MORE The world is in mortal peril. Sir Noi Crezant, the Lizard Knight, has been sent to gain the aid of the great warrior Amamiya Yuuhi in hopes of finding the Princess Samidare and protecting the planet from the incredible 'Biscuit Hammer' poised to crack the Earth in two. Unfortunately Yuuhi wants no part of it, and the Princess doesn't prove to be the shining 'hero of justice' role model that Noi had hoped for. HIDE
